content:
Method 1: (In the email list) select the email by long-pressing it or by tapping the icon before the email > tap the vertical three dots on the upper right corner > "Move".

Method 2: (Inside the email) tap the vertical three dots on the upper right corner > "Move".

Method 3: 3.1. You can configure swipe actions to "Move": "Settings" > "General settings" > "Interaction" > "Swipe actions" > configure action for "Right swipe" or "Left swipe" to "Move". 3.2. Then you can right-swipe or left-swipe the email to move it.

- - - - - -

If you do not see "Move" after tapping the vertical three dots, the following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "General settings" > "Display" > "Visible message actions" > tick "Move" > "OK".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
